attributes.action: educate those who don't understand what proper Electro music is really about.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Real Electro needs to include the following.
Lazers,
robots,
bass,
futuristic stuff,
analouge synthesizers,
b-boys,
freaky stuff,
TR-808 drum machines
and funk.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
